content:
{"updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "replacement": "**🚀 Turning My Future Over to AI – An Experiment in Career & Content**  
  
I’ve been unemployed for over two years. It’s been an incredibly challenging time for my family and me. If you’ve experienced long-term unemployment, you understand. If you haven’t, I hope you never do. But with the **exponential advances in AI**, I believe many white-collar workers will soon face the same reality.   
  
Today, I’m asking for your help. **Not just for me, but to test a new way forward.**  
  
### **🔹 How I Got Here & Why Job Searching is Broken**  
I was laid off at the end of 2022, just months after being hired to lead a strategic initiative. The role was newly created, unbudgeted, and I was told it would be difficult. **Three months in, I had built momentum and developed a plan to nearly double revenue.** I was offered a promotion… then, weeks later, was told my role was being eliminated in a layoff.  
  
For months, I followed every job search best practice:  
✔️ **Networking, referrals, personalized outreach**  
✔️ **Optimized resumes & LinkedIn profile with AI assistance**  
✔️ **Custom cover letters, keyword optimization, industry research**  
  
💡 **The result?** A few great conversations but no viable offers. Recruiters kept telling me, **"It’s a tough job market," "Things will pick up next quarter,"** but nothing changed.  
  
By September, I lowered my expectations significantly. I applied for **entry-level analyst and manager roles,** even in areas where I had built functions before. Still, I faced rejection—often because hiring managers were skeptical about why I would want a "lower" position.   
  
Realizing I needed to upskill, I spent months **training to be a data analyst—SQL, data visualization, the works.** I enjoyed it, but something became clear: **AI was already doing the job I was training for.**  
  
### **🔹 The AI-Driven Career Experiment Begins**  
📌 By February, after another month of failed job searching, I had to face reality:  
1️⃣ **The traditional job search wasn’t working.** My network was stale, I had no social media presence, and a two-year employment gap made things worse.  
2️⃣ **The employment landscape will not improve.** AI is replacing white-collar jobs at an insane pace—data analysts, customer service, financial analysts, creatives, and more. AI itself estimates it can replace **80-90%** of these roles.  
  
So, I did what I had been doing for months—I asked ChatGPT for advice. This AI knows **more about my career, skills, and job search than anyone.** It has helped with my resume iterations, job applications, networking strategies, and even alternative income ideas.  
  
Faced with limited time and resources, I fed AI **Y Combinator’s 2025 investment targets** (nearly all focused on automating white-collar work) and asked:  
📌 **"What should I do?"**  
  
It analyzed everything and gave me **two key recommendations:**  
🔹 **Learn AI automation—use tools to optimize job searching and business processes, then share that journey.**  
🔹 **Try to monetize my dog on social media—he has viral potential.**  
  
That’s when I realized: **Why not turn my future over to AI entirely? Not just learn it, but let it guide me back to generating income?**  
  
### **🔹 The AI Career Experiment: What Happens Next**  
📌 **1️⃣ I will document my AI-driven job search and automation journey.**  
📌 **2️⃣ I will apply AI to social media growth and business process automation.**  
📌 **3️⃣ AI will determine how I allocate my time based on the response to this post and my dog’s social media engagement.**  
  
If AI is going to shape the future, I’m embracing it fully.  
  
### **🔹 How You Can Help**  
1️⃣ **If you know of AI-driven roles where I can help companies adopt, implement, or optimize AI tools, let’s talk.** I’m open to starting over in salary—getting back to work is my priority. My background aligns with:  
- **AI Implementation & Strategy** (AI Adoption Consultant, AI Transformation Lead)  
- **Business Intelligence & Data-Driven Strategy** (BI Manager, Strategy & Analytics Manager)  
- **Revenue & Growth Optimization** (Revenue Operations Analyst, AI-Driven Sales Enablement)  
  
2️⃣ **Engage with this post.** Like, comment, or share—it will help me reach the right people.  
  
3️⃣ **If you love dogs, check out Chewy’s channels.** If AI is right and he does go viral, it could help sustain my family while I transition careers.  
  
🐶 **Follow The Wide Retriever:**  
📍 **Instagram:** [Insert IG handle]  
📍 **TikTok:** [Insert TikTok handle]  
📍 **YouTube Shorts:** [Insert YouTube handle]  
  
🚀 **This is an experiment in AI, career transformation, and content.** If you’re interested in how AI is reshaping careers, follow along—I’ll be sharing everything I learn.  
  
💬 **Have you ever taken AI’s career advice? What’s the most unexpected thing it has suggested?** Let’s discuss.  
  
_(Attaching Chewy’s latest video—because if AI is right, this might be part of my future too.)_"}]}
